Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Boston Hotel Buckminster. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Boston? This hotel has 2497 square feet (232 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
